topic: Mathematical Proof of Question Generation Method Contamination Reduction

  entities:
    Domain knowledge K|Knowledge Base
    Mutual information I(X;Y)|Technological Concept
    Mutual information I(K;qdirect|i)|Technological Concept
    Mutual information I(K;qindirect|d)|Technological Concept
    Contamination degree B(φ)|Technological Concept
    Direct method|Method
    Indirect method|Method

  proposition: Domain knowledge K is a space representing prior knowledge, biases, and latent representations in a Vision-Language Model (VLM).
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Domain knowledge K|REPRESENTS|prior knowledge
    Domain knowledge K|REPRESENTS|biases
    Domain knowledge K|REPRESENTS|latent representations
    Domain knowledge K|PART_OF|Vision-Language Model

  proposition: Mutual information I(X;Y) measures the statistical dependency between variables X and Y.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mutual information I(X;Y)|MEASURES|statistical dependency

  proposition: Mutual information I(K;qdirect|i) represents contamination between domain knowledge K and directly generated question qdirect given image i.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mutual information I(K;qdirect|i)|REPRESENTS|contamination
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Mutual information I(K;qdirect|i)|RELATES|Domain knowledge K
    Mutual information I(K;qdirect|i)|RELATES|directly generated question

  proposition: Mutual information I(K;qindirect|d) represents contamination between domain knowledge K and indirectly generated question qindirect given description d.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mutual information I(K;qindirect|d)|REPRESENTS|contamination
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Mutual information I(K;qindirect|d)|RELATES|Domain knowledge K
    Mutual information I(K;qindirect|d)|RELATES|indirectly generated question

  proposition: The contamination degree B(φ) of a process φ is proportional to the mutual information between domain knowledge K and generated question q.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Contamination degree B(φ)|PROPORTIONAL_TO|mutual information

    entity-entity relationships:
    Contamination degree B(φ)|RELATES|Domain knowledge K
    Contamination degree B(φ)|RELATES|generated question

  proposition: For the direct method, contamination B(f) is proportional to I(K;qdirect|i).
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Direct method|CONTAMINATION|proportional to I(K;qdirect|i)

  proposition: For the indirect method, contamination B(h ◦ g) is proportional to I(K;qindirect|d).
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Indirect method|CONTAMINATION|proportional to I(K;qindirect|d)

  proposition: The indirect method reduces question generation contamination by domain knowledge K.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Indirect method|REDUCES|question generation contamination

topic: Text Annotation Platform Details

  entities:
    Item data|Data Source
    Rachel|Person

  proposition: Item data contains three columns: Select Item Index, category, and race.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Item data|CONTAINS_COLUMNS|Select Item Index
    Item data|CONTAINS_COLUMNS|category
    Item data|CONTAINS_COLUMNS|race

  proposition: Total items in the annotation platform: 200.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Item data|TOTAL_ITEMS|200

  proposition: One item description involves Rachel being upset about breakfast preparation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Rachel|STATE|upset
    Rachel|CONTEXT|breakfast preparation

  proposition: The description is repeated in both the "entity" and "modified_description" columns.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Item data|COLUMN_DUPLICATE|entity
    Item data|COLUMN_DUPLICATE|modified_description

topic: Image Annotation Platform Details

  entities:
    Image Annotation Platform|Platform

  proposition: Total items in the image annotation platform: 3.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Image Annotation Platform|TOTAL_ITEMS|3

  proposition: One item description reads "People who never listen to their parents".
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Image Annotation Platform|DESCRIPTION|"People who never listen to their parents"

  proposition: The data quality status is marked as "Not Annotated".
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Image Annotation Platform|DATA_QUALITY|"Not Annotated"
